page.title: 17The M42 Motorway
page.content: The{M42 Motorway}is being constructed in l985 and it will pass close by the villages of Barnt Green, Alvechurch and Hopwood. It will link with the{M5}near Bromsgrove and will extend north east towards Nottingham. It will be very important for transport but it has changed the landscape drastically as some houses and a farm have been demolished. There has been much{local oppisition to the building of the motorway but it has still been built. The intended completion date for this stretch of the M42 is spring l986.
